summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 15th Avenue Northwest, et al, from West 65th Street to West 67th Street, and West 65th Street from 11th Avenue Northwest to 15th Avenue Northwest; all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, providing for the necessary surface drainage, all in accordance with Resolution No. 2814 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
